items.name: Cappuccino
items.description:
Our cappuccino is made in the modern style, balancing our full-bodied espresso with velvety steamed milk--not the stiff foam cap of yore. In specialty coffee circles this newer style is sometimes called a 'flat white.' But we consider it the new cappuccino standard.

Calories: 45-140

items.name: Caffè Latte
items.description:
One of our most popular drinks, our latte turns our assertive, chocolatey Hayes Valley Espresso velvety-sweet with a long pour of densely steamed milk.

Calories: 100-230

items.name: Gibraltar
items.description:
A Golden Gate Grind original, our Gibraltar is named for the beveled glass in which it's served. An espresso topped off with steamed milk, our version of a Spanish cortado is built for immediate quaffing.

Calories: 40-80

items.name: Caffè Mocha
items.description:
The tradition of combining coffee, chocolate, and milk or cream dates back to eighteenth-century Turn's Caffè al Bicerin. We source our chocolate from local purveyors, a different one in each city.

Calories: 210-360

items.name: Shakerato
items.description:
A spin on a classic Italian iced-coffee treat, our seasonal shakerato contains espresso and milk lightly sweetened with cane sugar, hand-shaken over ice until chilled and frothy.

Calories: 60-160

items.name: Americano
items.description:
Similar in strength to a pour over, our Americano also boasts the rich flavor of our bold, ristretto-style espresso.

Calories: 0-70

items.name: Iced Americano
items.description:
Our iced Americano is espresso pulled over cold water, served over ice.

Calories: 0

items.name: Iced Caffè Latte
items.description:
A chilled classic for a hot (or any) day: Our Hayes Valley Espresso pulled into your choice of milk, served over ice.

Calories: 60-110

items.name: Iced Caffè Mocha
items.description:
We source our chocolate from a local purveyor, so our ganaches are unique to their neighborhoods. It's just right for those mornings--and afternoons--when you need a slightly sweet lift.

Calories: 260-310

items.name: Bella Donovan
items.description:
Cozy and enveloping, Bella Donovan is our take on the archetypal Moka-Java blend, combining a fruited natural Ethiopian coffee with heftier coffees from Sumatra and Peru. Elegant served black, it's also pure comfort with milk or cream.

Calories: 0

items.name: Rwanda Nyanza Iwacu
items.description:
The best coffees from Rwanda, like this one, have the perfect balance of gentle acidity, apricot-like fruit intensity, and herbal complexity.

Calories: 0

items.name: Café Au Lait
items.description:
Our café au lait adds milky richness to any pour over or batch brew. Choose your coffee and we'll finish it off with steamed milk, be it dairy or non-dairy.

Calories: 40-70

items.name: Black Tea
items.description:
This full-bodied black tea blend pairs well with milk and sugar, and is balanced enough to enjoy on its own. Sourced from the Paralai Estate in southern India, it's certified organic and Fair Trade, grown within a wildlife sanctuary on a slope known locally as 'Elephants Hill.'

Calories: 0-70

items.name: Matcha Latte
items.description:
Made with matcha tea from the Uji tea fields in Kyoto prefecture, this umami-rich, bright green tea is lightly sweetened and served with your choice of steamed milk.

Calories: 50-210

items.name: Herbal Tea
items.description:
Reminiscent of the best mint teas, this is far more interesting, combining spearment, peppermint, lavender, and sage with bright lemongrass and orange peel.

Calories: 0-70

items.name: Hot Chocolate
items.description:
Sweet and creamy dreaminess with a base of fresh milk (non-dairy alternatives are also available).

Calories: 280-490
